## ...

```{r setup}
library(hafvog)
library(tidyverse)
zip_path <- system.file("zips", "A3-2024.zip", package = "hafvog")
res <- hv_read_hafvog(zip_path) |> map(hv_std)
```

## Some tidying

```{r}
res$stodvar |> 
  hv_std() |> 
  glimpse()
```
